title: Love Thy Neighbour (Friend-Zoned #2)
description: Storyline: Love Thy Neighbour (Friend-Zoned #2) Asher 'Ghost' Collins and Natalie Kovac shared a passionate night together. One neither of them can forget. So why is it so hard for them to be around each other? With no hope of the two getting along they decide to go their separate ways. And somehow end up closer than they've ever been. Will friendship ever be enough for the pair?
author: Belle Aurora
